register.title: Register
register.residenceDescription: To provide you with better service, please select your current residence
register.personalAccountDesc: This type of account is suitable for individuals or institutions seeking to trade, send, receive, and manage digital currency assets.
register.smsfAccountDesc: This type of account is suitable for individuals or companies acting as trustees of a Self-Managed Super Fund (SMSF). If you are investing on behalf of your SMSF, please select this account type.
register.emailVerificationTip: Please ensure this email can receive verification codes
register.pleaseAgreeTerms: Please agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
register.registrationSubmitted: Registration information submitted, please check your email for verification
